price: (Akaambiwa): Ewe Ibrahim! Wachilia mbali haya! Kwa hakika amri ya Mola wako Mlezi imekwisha kuja, na hakika hao itawafikia adhabu isiyo rudi nyuma.
arabic: يَٰٓإِبۡرَٰهِيمُ أَعۡرِضۡ عَنۡ هَٰذَآۖ إِنَّهُۥ قَدۡ جَآءَ أَمۡرُ رَبِّكَۖ وَإِنَّهُمۡ ءَاتِيهِمۡ عَذَابٌ غَيۡرُ مَرۡدُودٖ
footnotes: Malaika wakasema: Ewe Ibrahim! Wachilia mbali haya majadiliano, na kuwatakia rehema watu hawa. Kwani amri ya Mola wako Mlezi ya kuwaangamiza imekwisha kuja! Hapana budi kuwa adhabu itawashukia, na wala haitarudishwa kwa majadiliano au bila ya majadiliano.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: yāib'rāhīmu aʿriḍ ʿan hādhā innahu qad jāa amru rabbika wa-innahum ātīhim ʿadhābun ghayru mardūdin
